about_the_game:
Advantages of Prime

  • The ability to select lobbies with the same Prime accounts (without free accounts on the server)
  • Access to Steam inventory, weapon skins
  • The system of account levels and the issuance of Steam items

legal_notice:

Beyter Games Studio which develops this product does not want to offend anyone. When starting the game agree with this, and have no claims to the developers. If you purchased the game in Steam and you do not like the quality of the product, you can return according to the terms of Steam: .
